sourcesContent:
import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import "./singlePost.css" import { useEffect } from "react" import axios from "axios" export default function SinglePost() { const location =useLocation() const path=console.log(location.pathname.split("/")[2]) useEffect(()=>{ const getPost=async()=>{ const res=axios.get("/posts/"+path); console.log(res) }; getPost(); },[path]) return (
